promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical dragon fire-type pokemon holding a ornate shield. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Scorchshield, a a gigantic mythical dragon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Fierce Dragon. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "fire" or "Scorchshield". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, dragon-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: A mythical beast of burning intensity, Scorchshield inhabits arid landscapes. Harnessing Fierce Dragon, its blazing aura fends off threats.
